message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,500 for your product. I hope this aligns better with its value to me. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,000.  This still leaves room for you to get a good deal while allowing me to get a fair price. Let's try to make this work!

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $8,750 for your product. I believe this strikes a fair balance between the value I see in the product and your asking price.
